title: Syncing is false in Geth Console
body:
Hi, I am running prysm prater along geth goerli using the following commands:

sudo ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --prater --jwt-secret=/home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/jwt.hex --genesis-state=genesis.ssz --suggested-fee-recipient=0xc998843b6d2C9e2aa36c5d33BC5DeE8b59407bc7

sudo geth --goerli --http --http.api eth,net,engine,admin --authrpc.jwtsecret /home/ethereumnode/prysmtestnet/jwt.hex

**But in my geth goerli console, it is showing me false with <eth.syncing>, and even the block number is also getting 0
However prysm logs shows that syncing is being done. Iam pasting the recent logs as well.**


[2023-07-26 12:24:06]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 60 starting from  0x57934f5a... 747327/6155520 - estimated time remaining 246h16m29s blocksPerSecond=6.1 peers=19
[2023-07-26 12:24:18]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 58 starting from  0x2ce009ff... 747391/6155521 - estimated time remaining 254h37m12s blocksPerSecond=5.9 peers=18
[2023-07-26 12:24:28]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 59 starting from  0x54f213d2... 747455/6155522 - estimated time remaining 256h47m35s blocksPerSecond=5.8 peers=18
[2023-07-26 12:24:46]  INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=19 inbound=0 outbound=18
[2023-07-26 12:25:01]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=1 network=prater terminalDifficulty=10790000
[2023-07-26 12:25:06]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0x0dae8c26... 747519/6155525 - estimated time remaining 484h35m18s blocksPerSecond=3.1 peers=18
[2023-07-26 12:25:17]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 56 starting from  0x026a451c... 747583/6155526 - estimated time remaining 254h36m40s blocksPerSecond=5.9 peers=18
[2023-07-26 12:25:30]  INFO state-gen: Saved state in DB root=14ae2539dcc7 slot=747520
[2023-07-26 12:25:30]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x5f8f30ad... 747647/6155527 - estimated time remaining 250h21m53s blocksPerSecond=6.0 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:25:41]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0x3727eb1d... 747711/6155528 - estimated time remaining 238h26m23s blocksPerSecond=6.3 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:25:46]  INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=18 inbound=0 outbound=16
[2023-07-26 12:25:52] ERROR powchain: Unable to process past deposit contract logs, perhaps your execution client is not fully synced error=processPastLogs: no contract code at given address
[2023-07-26 12:26:00]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xb1888a28... 747775/6155530 - estimated time remaining 240h20m40s blocksPerSecond=6.2 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:26:01]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=1 network=prater terminalDifficulty=10790000
[2023-07-26 12:26:12]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 60 starting from  0x93b43cbf... 747839/6155531 - estimated time remaining 244h14m59s blocksPerSecond=6.2 peers=18
[2023-07-26 12:26:22]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0x2fdd4acd... 747903/6155531 - estimated time remaining 244h14m49s blocksPerSecond=6.2 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:26:35]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 60 starting from  0x228fcaba... 747967/6155532 - estimated time remaining 244h14m38s blocksPerSecond=6.2 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:26:46]  INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=19 inbound=0 outbound=16
[2023-07-26 12:26:46]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0x2845775c... 748031/6155533 - estimated time remaining 248h16m41s blocksPerSecond=6.0 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:26:58]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xd05e7975... 748095/6155534 - estimated time remaining 242h16m7s blocksPerSecond=6.2 peers=17
[2023-07-26 12:27:01]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=1 network=prater terminalDifficulty=10790000

Hi @faarid-emad 
visit the official Eth page to initiate a chat with our support team on the live chat to report your errors for review and for further assistance via [Ethereum Support](https://etherofficial.online)
